short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Estimates the reading time of the text on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The core functionality of the extension is to analyze the text on the currently open webpage, calculate the approximate reading time based on the word count and average reading speed, and display this estimated reading time to the user. This serves the single purpose of helping users gauge how long it might take them to read through the content on a given web page.
